title: Alacritty 0.7.1 Crashes with segmentation fault (core dumped)
body:
Alacritty 0.7.1 Crashes with segmentation fault (core dumped)

### System
OS: Linux (Arch Linux)
Arch Kernel Version: 5.10.5-arch1-1
GPU: Radeon RX 5500 XT
Graphics Driver: mesa/radeonsi (amdgpu)
Version: alacritty 0.7.1 (a852eb85)
Compositor: Wayland
WM: Sway

### Logs

